Catalan Proverb: A qui madruga, Déu l'ajuda.
English Translation: God helps those who rise early.

Catalan Proverb: Qui no plora, no mama.
English Translation: He who doesn't cry, doesn't suckle.

Catalan Proverb: De mica en mica s'omple la pica.
English Translation: Little by little, the sink fills.

Catalan Proverb: No es pot tenir el cistell ple i la panxa buida.
English Translation: You can't have a full basket and an empty stomach.

Catalan Proverb: A qui poc li costa, poc li val.
English Translation: What costs little is worth little.

Catalan Proverb: L'home proposa i Déu disposa.
English Translation: Man proposes, God disposes.

Catalan Proverb: Qui no arrisca no guanya.
English Translation: Who does not risk, does not win.

Catalan Proverb: A l'arbre caigut tots hi fan llenya.
English Translation: When the tree falls, everyone makes firewood.

Catalan Proverb: D'on no n'hi ha, no en raja.
English Translation: Where there is nothing, nothing flows.

Catalan Proverb: Aigua passada no mou molí.
English Translation: Water that has passed doesn't turn the mill.

Catalan Proverb: Cadascú al seu lloc i el món anirà bé.
English Translation: Everyone in their place, and the world will go well.

Catalan Proverb: Les paraules se les emporta el vent.
English Translation: Words are carried away by the wind.

Catalan Proverb: Més val un ocell a la mà que cent volant.
English Translation: A bird in the hand is worth more than a hundred flying.

Catalan Proverb: Què volen que els faci? Un miracle?
English Translation: What do they want me to do? A miracle?

Catalan Proverb: Fins a la vaca vella li arriba el moment de la veritat.
English Translation: Even the old cow has its moment of truth.

Catalan Proverb: No es pot viure amb el cor al puny.
English Translation: One cannot live with the heart in pain.

Catalan Proverb: Fent un pas es fa el camí.
English Translation: By taking a step, the way is made.

Catalan Proverb: La roba bruta es renta a casa.
English Translation: Dirty laundry is washed at home.

Catalan Proverb: Qui té boca, té pota.
English Translation: He who has a mouth, has a foot (talks too much).

Catalan Proverb: A la taula i al llit, al primer crit.
English Translation: To the table and to bed at the first call.

Catalan Proverb: El sol brilla per tothom.
English Translation: The sun shines for everyone.

Catalan Proverb: Mai és tard per començar.
English Translation: It is never too late to start.

Catalan Proverb: Qui diu que pot, no pot; qui diu que no pot, pot.
English Translation: He who says he can, cannot; he who says he cannot, can.

Catalan Proverb: Tota pedra fa paret.
English Translation: Every stone builds the wall.

Catalan Proverb: Un crit a temps, val més que un milió de paraules.
English Translation: A cry in time is worth more than a million words.

Catalan Proverb: No hi ha mal que per bé no vingui.
English Translation: Every cloud has a silver lining.

Catalan Proverb: Si un no vol, dos no barallen.
English Translation: If one doesn't want, two don't fight.

Catalan Proverb: De tant voler-ho tot, se'n perd el millor.
English Translation: By wanting everything, the best is lost.

Catalan Proverb: A cavall regalat no se li mira la dentadura.
English Translation: Don't look a gift horse in the mouth.

Catalan Proverb: Els temps són dolents, però n'hi ha que són pitjors.
English Translation: Times are bad, but some are worse.

Catalan Proverb: Mai plou a gust de tothom.
English Translation: It never rains to everyone's liking.

Catalan Proverb: Quan el riu sona, aigua porta.
English Translation: When the river sounds, it carries water.

Catalan Proverb: Qui té boca, que parli.
English Translation: He who has a mouth, let him speak.

Catalan Proverb: Més val no prometre que no poder complir.
English Translation: Better not to promise than to fail to deliver.

Catalan Proverb: A cada porc li arriba el seu Sant Martí.
English Translation: Every pig has its Saint Martin.

Catalan Proverb: Fins el riu més tranquil pot portar una corrent forta.
English Translation: Even the calmest river can carry a strong current.

Catalan Proverb: Una mentida dita a temps salva mil veritats.
English Translation: A lie told in time saves a thousand truths.

Catalan Proverb: Quan la poma cau, l’arbre no s’ensenya.
English Translation: When the apple falls, the tree doesn't teach.

Catalan Proverb: Les excuses són com el paper higiènic, tothom les fa servir.
English Translation: Excuses are like toilet paper, everyone uses them.

Catalan Proverb: No tot el que brilla és or.
English Translation: Not all that glitters is gold.

Catalan Proverb: Al final tot s'acaba sabent.
English Translation: In the end, everything is known.

Catalan Proverb: Qui vol peix, que es mulli el cul.
English Translation: He who wants fish, must wet his ass.

Catalan Proverb: No per molts camins arribes més aviat.
English Translation: You don't arrive earlier by taking many roads.

Catalan Proverb: Si plou a l'abril, bon pa.
English Translation: If it rains in April, good bread.

Catalan Proverb: Qui tem el mal no viu.
English Translation: He who fears the bad, does not live.

Catalan Proverb: L’alegria del cor fa créixer el cos.
English Translation: The joy of the heart makes the body grow.

Catalan Proverb: De dos mals, el menor.
English Translation: Of two evils, the lesser.

Catalan Proverb: Val més estar sol que mal acompanyat.
English Translation: Better to be alone than in bad company.

Catalan Proverb: L'amor entra pels ulls.
English Translation: Love enters through the eyes.

Catalan Proverb: Quan hi ha gana, no hi ha pa sec.
English Translation: When you're hungry, there's no such thing as dry bread.

Catalan Proverb: Això és l'arbre de la vida.
English Translation: This is the tree of life.

Catalan Proverb: Més val tard que mai.
English Translation: Better late than never.

Catalan Proverb: D'on menys t'ho esperes, surt el sol.
English Translation: From where you least expect, the sun rises.

Catalan Proverb: En boca tancada no entren mosques.
English Translation: Flies don't enter a closed mouth.

Catalan Proverb: A l'últim crit, tot es resol.
English Translation: At the last shout, everything is solved.

Catalan Proverb: La paciència és la mare de la ciència.
English Translation: Patience is the mother of science.

Catalan Proverb: Qui fa el que pot, no està obligat a més.
English Translation: He who does what he can, is not obliged to more.

Catalan Proverb: Tots els camins porten a Roma.
English Translation: All roads lead to Rome.

Catalan Proverb: La sort és per a qui la busca.
English Translation: Luck is for those who seek it.

Catalan Proverb: Qui avisa no és traïdor.
English Translation: He who warns is not a traitor.

Catalan Proverb: El que no arrisca, no guanya.
English Translation: Nothing ventured, nothing gained.

Catalan Proverb: Dona't per vençut quan puguis.
English Translation: Give up when you can.

Catalan Proverb: Per molts gols que facis, sempre n'hi haurà un millor.
English Translation: No matter how many goals you score, there will always be a better one.

Catalan Proverb: Quan el riu és tranquil, tothom pot travessar-lo.
English Translation: When the river is calm, everyone can cross it.

Catalan Proverb: La caritat comença per un mateix.
English Translation: Charity begins at home.

Catalan Proverb: Cada vent té el seu furó.
English Translation: Every wind has its hole.

Catalan Proverb: Al món res és etern.
English Translation: Nothing in the world is eternal.

Catalan Proverb: Qui no té feina, el gat pentina.
English Translation: He who has no work, combs the cat.

Catalan Proverb: En terra de cecs, el tort és rei.
English Translation: In the land of the blind, the one-eyed man is king.

Catalan Proverb: Mai diguis mai.
English Translation: Never say never.

Catalan Proverb: Totes les màscares cauen al final.
English Translation: All masks fall in the end.

Catalan Proverb: Camarada, el temps és or.
English Translation: Comrade, time is gold.

Catalan Proverb: Els petits gestos són els més grans.
English Translation: Small gestures are the greatest.

Catalan Proverb: Amb paciència, tot es resol.
English Translation: With patience, everything is solved.

Catalan Proverb: Tothom té un lloc al món.
English Translation: Everyone has a place in the world.

Catalan Proverb: L’arbre que neix torçat mai endreça la seva branca.
English Translation: The tree that is born crooked never straightens its branch.

Catalan Proverb: Qui no aprèn del passat, es condena a repetir-lo.
English Translation: He who doesn't learn from the past is condemned to repeat it.

Catalan Proverb: L’amistat és com una planta, cal cuidar-la.
English Translation: Friendship is like a plant, it needs care.

Catalan Proverb: Si tens un problema, comparteix-lo.
English Translation: If you have a problem, share it.

Catalan Proverb: La fe mou muntanyes.
English Translation: Faith moves mountains.

Catalan Proverb: No tot el que brilla és or.
English Translation: Not all that glitters is gold.

Catalan Proverb: A la mar, tot el peix és bo.
English Translation: In the sea, all fish are good.

Catalan Proverb: Qui guarda, troba.
English Translation: He who saves, finds.

Catalan Proverb: A qui està a l'ombra, li cal la llum.
English Translation: He who is in the shadow, needs light.

Catalan Proverb: De l'amor a l'odi només hi ha un pas.
English Translation: From love to hate, there is only one step.

Catalan Proverb: El més important no és el que tens, sinó el que fas.
English Translation: The most important thing is not what you have, but what you do.

Catalan Proverb: Qui té paciència, tot ho aconsegueix.
English Translation: He who has patience, achieves everything.

Catalan Proverb: Més val un amic que cent coneguts.
English Translation: Better one friend than a hundred acquaintances.

Catalan Proverb: Qui té boca, té poder.
English Translation: He who has a mouth, has power.

Catalan Proverb: Per cada roca, hi ha un camí.
English Translation: For every rock, there is a path.

Catalan Proverb: Les coses no sempre són el que semblen.
English Translation: Things are not always what they seem.

Catalan Proverb: Qui busca troba.
English Translation: He who searches, finds.

Catalan Proverb: L'amor és cec.
English Translation: Love is blind.

Catalan Proverb: Després de la tempesta ve la calma.
English Translation: After the storm comes the calm.

Catalan Proverb: Els qui es creuen massa, sovint cauen més fort.
English Translation: Those who believe too much in themselves often fall harder.

Catalan Proverb: No deixis per demà el que pots fer avui.
English Translation: Don't put off until tomorrow what you can do today.

Catalan Proverb: Qui no pensa, no viu.
English Translation: He who doesn't think, doesn't live.

Catalan Proverb: A la mà de qui et trobes, estàs.
English Translation: In the hand of the one you're with, you stay.

Catalan Proverb: No totes les lluernes il·luminen igual.
English Translation: Not all fireflies light the same.

Catalan Proverb: Qui vol més, perd tot.
English Translation: He who wants more, loses everything.
